paliperidone long acting
paliperidone long acting
3 mg, PO, qdaily, drug form: tab-long acting
6 mg, PO, qdaily, drug form: tab-long acting
9 mg, PO, qdaily, drug form: tab-long acting

Ensure tolerance of oral risperidone before initiating long-acting risperidone injections.  Note: if newly initiating long-acting risperidone, or patient has missed more than 6 weeks of injections, oral risperidone should be continued for 3 weeks duration following the first injection of long-acting risperidone.  Ensure payment/coverage for medication post-discharge arranged prior to starting long acting injection.  See link to BC Pharmacare risperidone microspheres (CONSTA) Special Authority Criteria

Note: if newly initiating long-acting paliperidone, oral paliperidone/risperiDONE should be discontinued when starting the first injection of long-acting paliperidone.  Ensure payment/coverage for medication post-discharge arranged prior to starting long acting injection.  See link to BC Pharmacare paliperidone palmitate (INVEGA) Special Authority Criteria
